transcription: Pushin' against the grain We can ask but won't receive But you apologize over and over You don't want to hear  Cause it's a white noise, swallow it deep Baby we'll know love by eventually  We see through the stars Burning in the atmosphere But you apologize over and over You don't want to know Cause it's all white noise  Swallow it be Can you high-five now?  This is how I rise This is how I rise
